RekaDishMake the Most of Every Ingredient.

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 05, 2025

1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy explains how RekaDish (“we,” “our,” “us”) collects, uses, and protects information when you use our website. By accessing RekaDish, you consent to this Privacy Policy.

2. Information We Collect

A. Information You Provide Directly

  • Email address
  • Name
  • Account details (if you create an account)
  • Future submissions such as comments, ratings, or uploaded content

B. Information Collected Automatically

When you use RekaDish, we automatically collect:

  • IP address
  • Device, operating system, and browser type
  • Usage logs and interaction behavior
  • Advertising identifiers
  • Analytics data
  • Recipe browsing history (this feature will be added in the future for personalization)

C. Cookies

RekaDish uses:

  • Google Analytics cookies for traffic insights
  • Google Ads cookies for ad personalization and measurement
  • Ezoic cookies for ad delivery, reporting, and analytics
  • Functional cookies for saving preferences, ratings, and user session behavior

You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but some features may not function correctly.

3. How We Use Your Information

We use collected information for purposes including:

  • Personalizing your recipe experience
  • Saving account settings and favorites
  • Providing analytics to improve the site
  • Displaying ads and sponsored content
  • Improving future recommendation features
  • Ensuring security and preventing abuse
  • Communicating with users as needed

4. How We Share Information

We may share information with:

  • Supabase (database & authentication)
  • Google Ads
  • Google Analytics
  • Ezoic Inc. (Advertising Partner)
  • Website hosting providers (when selected)

We do not sell personal information to third parties.

5. Advertising Privacy Statement (Ezoic)

This website uses Ezoic to manage third-party interest-based advertising. Ezoic may use cookies, web beacons, and other technologies to collect information about your activities on this website and other websites to provide you with targeted advertising based on your interests.

You can view the full details of Ezoic's privacy policy and valid advertising partners here:http://g.ezoic.net/privacy/rekadish.com

6. Affiliate Links & Sponsored Content

RekaDish may include affiliate links or sponsored posts. When users click affiliate links, we may earn a commission at no extra cost to the user. All sponsored content will be clearly disclosed.

7. User Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

  • Access the personal data we store about you
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Request corrections
  • Opt out of personalized advertising
  • Disable cookies

8. Data Security

We use reasonable security measures to protect personal information, but no system is completely secure. Users submit information at their own risk.

9. Children’s Privacy

RekaDish is accessible to all ages. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without parental consent. If you believe information was collected from a child, please contact us for removal.

10. International Users

RekaDish operates in New Jersey, USA. By using the site, international users consent to transferring their data to the United States.

11. Data Retention

We retain information only as long as necessary for business, operational, or legal reasons. Users may request deletion of their data.

12. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Continued use ofRekaDish after updates indicates acceptance of the revised policy.

13. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions, contact us at:
[support@rekadish.com]
